page.title: 05A day in the life of.....
page.content: A working mother in Hurworth - awake at 7am, family up soon after.We make our own breakfast and wash up and tidy the bedrooms, and out to school and work at 8.30 am. I drive 4 miles to the office where as a Secretary I put in a busy day typing, in telephone enquiries, appointments, banking, accounts and everyday problems.I break for lunch at 12.30 pm and walk to the shops for groceries.I finish work at 4pm and travel home to start the evening meal; while eating we chat and exchange news of the day.House work must then be done,the family perhaps out at Karate, keep fit, swimming, playing or gardening.After 9pm,a chance to read, watch television have a chat with my husband, finally before bed, lunches to be packed for the next day, and to bed at 11pm.
